data.title: Perfect for a small dinner
data.text: We love to go here when we don't want a huge meal, though if you order a bowl, it is a lot of food. We have tried many different tacos, and all have been good. The shrimp tempura taco is our favorite. Also, the appetizer avocado rolls and guacamole/chips are excellent.

data.title: Forgot how good it was !!!
data.text: I had a date with family and chose double T... It has a great mix and match taco combo that everyone in my party was very pleased.... My choice was the rich man and the grilled mahi mahi taco... It was very good !!! Plus hot and fresh !!! Wait staff was good but pushy to leave... She was young so maybe not aware that it was over the top ...nice touch to see the manager going table to table !!!! Will certainly return .....

data.title: Awesome!!!
data.text: AWESOME food and service!!!  Trey and our waitress were THE BEST!!!  We will definitely be back!  Please open one near Cleveland, GA!❤️

data.title: Good tacos, bowls and empanadas
data.text: Excellent restaurant with two locations: one downtown and one across the University 16 movie theater. The beef empanadas are very good and come with pink and green dipping sauces. The rice bowls and the tacos are great too, especially the Asada Zing taco and the BBQ Short Rib taco. The Shrimp de Fuego appetizer is good, but not as spicy as we expected. If you have room for dessert, try the sopaipillas or the s'mores egg rolls.

data.title: Must have avocado egg roll
data.text: If you like avocado, you will love avocado egg rolls with two different sauces. The menu  has an Asian/Latino flair. It was a nice experience. We sat outside. Very young  & energetic wait staff. Give it a try!

data.title: Light, Fresh Fusion
data.text: We visited for a late lunch, our second visit in two weeks.  My wife and I both ordered the Tsunami Trio which includes two tacos selected from a list of a dozen specialty tacos.  The Trio includes a side selection -- salad or other item.  The food was outstanding.  It was light, fresh and tasty.  The manager visited our table to see that we were pleased with lunch.  Wait staff is young and energetic.  Share the sopapillas and ice cream for dessert -- very enjoyable.  We will go back again.

data.title: Great tots, decent tacos
data.text: I recently ate at Taqueria Tsunami with high hopes - I had heard so many great things! While I enjoyed my tater tots and teriyaki chicken taco, my shredded chicken taco left a bit to be desired. The atmosphere is very cool though and I was go again to order the teriyaki chicken taco again and maybe try a chicken bowl.

data.title: Girls day out
data.text: This was my first visit to Taqueria Tsunami and I can assure you there will be many more in store. Food absolutely wonderful... Wait staff was polite and courteous, plus very knowledgeable.   My favorite item ordered was the avocado and cilantro egg roll. Can you say YUMMY!!!

data.title: Unique experience
data.text: I wanted something different,  and this fit the bill! While I was a bit sceptical of a resteraunt's ability to combine Latin with Asian, I think this place did a good job. The Skinny Wave Margarita was fresh and very tasty, and I loved the menu's variety and unique combinations.

data.title: Awesome!!
data.text: This fusion restaurant is fantastic! The shrimp tempura taco was my favorite, followed by the Korean short rib.

data.title: Wow...
data.text:
This place was really good. Whole family enjoyed it. The empanadas for appetizer were very tasty.

Although at first impressions it may seem that $3.50 for a single small taco is a bit much, the food overall was well worth it. 

I had the trio combo with two tacos and a side and was plenty of food. 

The ice cream apple dessert is a must. 

Well done guys!

data.title: Great tacos!
data.text: Girls night out here was great! The Asian nachos were delicious!  I had the tacos and they were super delicious .  The bowls looked yummy too. Our service was great!

data.title: Eclectic take on food
data.text: This is a fusion between Asian and Mexican food. It's very affordable and has somewhat of a small menu but offers a few choices. It's very small but does offer a nice outside patio. The drinks are pricey but fresh. I ordered the Asian Nachos and the portion is enough to share. Service is always great!

data.title: Taqueria Tsunami
data.text: Don't know what to expect coming in - was seated fast. We ordered the Asian Nachos (pretty good), All American Bowl (yum!) & the Tsunami Quatro (I recommend the Pacific Rim Taco- it's good but compared to fish tacos from Key West & Fort Walton beach- somehow it lacked some kind of sauce). We will be back

data.title: Traveling from Missouri
data.text: Was in GA for work and client recommended this restaurant.  Excellent, excellent, excellent!  The Skinny Wave margarita hit the spot, not too sweet. Avocado egg roll was very tasty and the short rib taco was my favorite. Fast, friendly service to top ot off.

data.title: Enjoyed it!
data.text: Services was fast, friendly and informative. The Mexican Mule was delicious and I liked that they had a kids menu!

data.title: Latin/Asian yummy fusion
data.text: I wasn't too sure what to expect from a taqueria that specialized in latin/asian food but this is a really good fusion.  Definitely enjoyed the dining experience and it wasn't too big of a hit on the wallet for the quality of food,

data.title: Super yum!!
data.text: Love this place!! Food is great, staff is great and drinks are great.Bright happy ambience. Right in front of the movie theater. Have a few and walk to the movies!!

data.title: Holy cow!
data.text: Wife and I went here on a recommendation, and the tastes were amazing! She had Tempora Shrimp Taco, and I had a "Bowl". The bowl had rice, beans, meat ald lettuce. Next time I would get her taco! It was wonderful! Service was great, and waitress was so helpful! We're already planning a trip back!

data.title: SO not what I was expecting!!
data.text:
Start off with the avacado eggrolls - I am not an avacado fan, but these were the most delicious things I've ever had! I've been back a few times now, and have enjoyed everything - GREAT tots as a side, the tacos are freshly made (soft shell) with a unique combination of flavors - try a combination platter to taste as many as you can!
My daughter got the short rib asian nachos during our last visit - made with fried wonton strips instead of chips the flavor was SPOT ON! I had the quesadilla, and the flavor was fabulous!
Love the staff, they always have a great smile, and the one time something wasn't right it was fixed IMMEDIATELY with apologies.... go often, try everything!
